answers.answer: Yes its normal am 39+1 and this has been happening to me since I was 37 weeks

thanks for the response, some people were trying to tell me it was preeclampsia and I know this sounds silly but it made me cry. Guess I got extra worked up from the hormones. I haven't had any protein in my urine and have had perfect blood pressure so this is a relief. Thankyou

question: I am 38 weeks and 1 day and am having swelling in my feet and hands. I have perfect blood pressure every time I go to he doctor so I am positive it is not preeclampsia. Sometimes I even get tingling feelings in my hands and feet. What is this? I read that it is edema but I am no expert. Advice please.
title: Swelling
